scripts.build: npm run build-collect-shell-versions & npm run build-get-shell-app & npm run build-create-tenant & npm run build-delete-tenant
scripts.build-collect-shell-versions: ncc build src/collect-shell-versions/action.ts -o dist/actions/collect-shell-versions -m & ncc build src/collect-shell-versions/index.ts -o dist/scripts/collect-shell-versions
scripts.build-get-shell-app: ncc build src/get-shell-app/action.ts -o dist/actions/get-shell-app -m & ncc build src/get-shell-app/index.ts -o dist/scripts/get-shell-app
scripts.build-create-tenant: ncc build src/create-tenant/action.ts -o dist/actions/create-tenant -m & ncc build src/create-tenant/index.ts -o dist/scripts/create-tenant
scripts.build-delete-tenant: ncc build src/delete-tenant/action.ts -o dist/actions/delete-tenant -m & ncc build src/delete-tenant/index.ts -o dist/scripts/delete-tenant
